document.full_text: a reported "sheen" in the gulf of mexico off the coast of louisiana is likely the result of large amounts of sediment, not spilled oil, the u.s. coast guard said on sunday.
document.title: substance in gulf of mexico likely sediment, not oil
lines_and_colors: a reported "sheen" in the gulf of mexico off the coast of louisiana is likely the result of large amounts of sediment, not spilled oil, the u.s. coast guard said on sunday.
